Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.13 Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika » 1.13.1 Parittārammaṇapada » 1.13.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika
Parittārammaṇapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
387.
830Hetu parittārammaṇo dhammo hetussa parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
388.
831Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
832Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
833Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
834(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.13.2 Mahaggatārammaṇapada >>
